name: Get Yeetied
description:
The War between the humans and yetis only escelates. The Yeti Council has chosen you to manage the Yeti War Machine - and its Orbital Yeti Cannon.

"Get Yeetied" is a turn-based non-sensical chaotic card game where you shoot different kind of yetis into space. You have 5 actions you can take a turn. You can make the yetis, research yetis and shoot yetis.

Fun times for all ages :)
